website_summaries.verdict: The Acer Aspire R7-572-6423 desktop-replacement laptop still looks intriguing, but closer examination reveals a decent laptop bogged down by an awkward design.
pros: Lovely 1,920-by-1,080 resolution display is improved with N-Trig DuoSense technology and stylus support
cons: Performance, though improved over its predecessor, is not spectacular

customer_reviews.title: Great design
customer_reviews.text: I have poor vision and I've tried in vain to comfortably use laptops. Even the 15 inch Retina MacBook Pro was one I reluctantly sold. But this is great since you can bring the screen closer. And the touch screen is actually pretty awesome too. Let's face it: traditional laptops are horribly designed and un-ergonomic. The only thing that would make this perfect would be if you could raise the height of the screen as well as move it forward. I can't believe CNET trashed this thing. Live a little and be open minded. Change is good and I hope this isn't a one-off since laptops definitely need an extreme makeover.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan D

customer_reviews.title: This is an awesome computer. The thing I like most about it
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome computer. The thing I like most about it, is having the mouse pad behind they keyboard out of my way. The screen can move to just about any position needed. I thought I would hate windows 8, but after poking around in it for a few minutes and getting used to it, and being able to find what I need on it, I ended up really liking the operating system. It is light enough to carry around with no problem. The display is crisp and clear. It has an HMDI port, and put a very nice picture on my tv as well. It was not bogged down with a lot of bloatware.
customer_reviews.author: Gail

customer_reviews.title: Acer R7
customer_reviews.text: I got my R7 and have been using it for a while. It was refurbished but looks and feels new. I love it. Great touch screen. You can use it as a tablet or a laptop. Lighted keyboard is very nice. I also like the fact that the touchpad is located above the keys. When it's below the keys like it is on normal PC's I find I accidentally trigger it while typing and my cursor runs amok.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn S Barber

customer_reviews.title: Love the laptop so far
customer_reviews.text: It's just been a few days but so far I am loving it. I really like how the screen can be re-positioned to suit my needs as I move around with it. Only two real complaints 1) The keyboard feels a little cramped. 2) If you set your fonts real small the touch screen can be hard to hit links properly. I also use a trackball so it's not a huge issue for me Highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Thomas G.

customer_reviews.title: Vibrant colours and beautiful design.
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love my R7. It runs smoothly, and the resolution is so beautiful, I almost shed tears lol. It works great and is quite handy. The hinge is totally amazing though I never really get to need it. Overall I'll recommend this laptop to any human being! Thumbs up 😊
customer_reviews.author: sharry97

customer_reviews.title: Cheap price. Excellent condition.
customer_reviews.text: All ok. No probs. Arrived as expected item as described. Good price. Excellent condition as a refurbished item. Only a very tiny mark on hinge. Was missing wrist rest that comes with the laptop new that may have been when it got re packaged for shipping to Australia, not sure.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Holton

customer_reviews.title: Bought refurbished and had hinge/keyboard/touchscreen problems shortly into product life ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought refurbished and had hinge/keyboard/touchscreen problems shortly into product life. No warranty on refurbished products, but I suppose that is the risk I took.
customer_reviews.author: J. Ott-Holland

customer_reviews.title: I like it!
customer_reviews.text: It is an amazing product. But this refurbished item come without the Acer Active Stylus, which make me a little disappointed.. In general it's feel good, the FHD touch screen is very clear and sensitive. And I can access my data in 10 seconds after boot ( I added an mSATA SSD by myself), but the power button especially the volume key are such poor..
customer_reviews.author: KC

customer_reviews.title: wonderful laptop
customer_reviews.text: wonderful laptop , i love it , its solid ,and extremely responsive , its very high resolution screen is the best ,and its metal cover is very nice and well polished
customer_reviews.author: mr2000jp

customer_reviews.title: Apple Killer
customer_reviews.text: I have jokingly referred to my R7 as my "apple killer". I have flipped my R7 open when I am around all my Mac owing friends, and challenged them to show me what they can do. Then I flip through all of the different positions the R7 can assume, and then when I'm finished, I ask them what they have "under the hood?" After comparing specs (size, power, adaptability, etc), I zip it up, smile and as I walk away, I tell them "...don't feel bad, your little 'apple logo' thingy looks cute."
customer_reviews.author: charles r. love

customer_reviews.title: LOVE <3
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, love!!!!! Literally anything anyone could want in a laptop, tablet, easel, tv, anything! You name it, this laptop does it! Kinda stinks sometimes that there isn't a DVD tray, but you can easily buy an external if you need it. All in all, I love it! It's so pretty and people always think it's awesome! Fast processor and stylish!
customer_reviews.author: Anna Madison

customer_reviews.title: This laptop perfomance is good, only the backspace key is not install well
customer_reviews.text: This laptop perfomance is good, only the backspace key is not install well, but after reset it, it's OK now, looks cool, a little bit heavy.
customer_reviews.author: ZIPPLE

customer_reviews.title: a great deal
customer_reviews.text: Very worried about buying refurbished. After two weeks, I have had zero issues. Very pleased with functionality. Design is extremely well thought out. Love the placement of keyboard first. With the touch screen I've only had to use the mouse pad twice. The screen tilt is amazingly solid. The software is solid as well. Windows 8.1 looks and acts better than expected. Extremely pleased so far (knock on wood). Even I could afford to buy new, I would purchase this model. It is, hands down, the best design I've come across in a laptop.
customer_reviews.author: craig miller

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: HArd dive was missing the attachment rack to the board and was able to become disconnected
customer_reviews.author: Marvo

customer_reviews.title: very nice except small flaking paints around corners
customer_reviews.text: very nice except small flaking paints around corners. It runs fast and the touch screen is very smooth, but the hard disk is quite noisy.
customer_reviews.author: Zhang Kang

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love it. ..vmware,linux,Gns3 etc installed and working fine. .
customer_reviews.author: Simba

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: This is a second-hand old laptop instead of so-called official notebook
customer_reviews.author: chenxianxiang

customer_reviews.title: COMPACT, LIGHT, FLAT, NO OVERHEATING...
customer_reviews.text: GOOD FOR THE HUSBAND BAD FOR THE WIFE. WIFE: "MOUSE FINGER PAD IS NOT ACCURATE IT LAGS!" HUSBAND: "IT'S A TOUCH SCREEN TOO..."
customer_reviews.author: Arlene B.

customer_reviews.title: Do Not Buy ACER products! Thier BIOS is junk!!!
customer_reviews.text: Took a chance with an Acer refurbished unit, bad decision it is now completely dead 4/4/2015. Many Acer products have cheap easily corrupted BIOS chips. Even after I installed the latest fix my BIOS was corrupted when changing the boot drive setting and saving the changes. Go to the Acer forum and search for BIOS corrupted or Google "Acer BIOS corrupted", this is information you need to know BEFORE you buy!!! Better yet NEVER buy any ACER product because their BIOS is junk and their customer support is just as bad.
customer_reviews.author: Great Day

customer_reviews.title: return it
customer_reviews.text: I found 2 small scratches on the screen, made me feel uncomfortable . return it at once. buy asus later.
customer_reviews.author: derek

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Best computer I've ever owned. The screen is beautiful, and the smart design of the hinge makes windows 8 actually fun to use, since it allows you to use the touch screen. The track pad is still easily accessible if you really want to use it, but using a stylus is much more fun and easier. This computer is not for someone who wants a traditional laptop or tablet, it's for someone who's interested in a perfect blend of both. The htc stylus works perfectly on it as well, aand is under 10 dollars.
customer_reviews.author: Tesia

customer_reviews.title: solid computer a little different but i like it light and good looking i was pleasantly surprised ...
customer_reviews.text: solid computer a little different but i like it light and good looking i was pleasantly surprised window 8 will drive you nuts but that not the computers fault i will look at acer when it comer time to buy another as this is my second acer laptop and the first one 6 years old and is still going strong
customer_reviews.author: John Henderson

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic computer
customer_reviews.text: This 2-in-1 laptop really should be called a 4-in-1 or a 5-in-1 laptop due to all the useful configurations that it can be used in. Most of the time you'll find me using it in the "Ezel mode" with the screen brought closer to the keyboard. It's so nice to be able to have the screen closer to you for touch and reading. The display by the way is amazingly clear and vivid. In my opinion, this represents the future of laptops!
customer_reviews.author: River

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed Purchase
customer_reviews.text: This is absolutely the worst choice I have ever made in buying a computer. It's now 14 months after I purchased it and it will no longer turn on. Throughout the 14 months of ownership, I had multiple issues with the battery charging, a finicky power button, poor WiFi performance, constant freeze ups, and poor blue tooth connectivity. I am a firm believer in that "you get what you pay for", but for a thousand dollars I would have expected better quality from Acer.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Great computer for photoshop
customer_reviews.text: I have had mine for over a year, and I love it. With the right Acer Stylus and a plugin, you can draw on it like a cintiq. Great for photoshop. I do some 3d on it but the graphics are not meant for that. light and battery lasts quite a while.
customer_reviews.author: Shy

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful display, wifi works great
customer_reviews.text: Excellent design and function, brilliant display, no wifi issues. Add stylus and LAN adapter to complete this laptop. Battery life could be better
customer_reviews.author: Craig

customer_reviews.title: I like everything else about that laptop and I was about ...
customer_reviews.text: No CD drive... thumb down! come-on. I like everything else about that laptop and I was about to order it when I saw I does not have a CD port and automatically change my mind about it.
customer_reviews.author: belac1

product_meta.title: Acer Aspire R7-572-6423 2-in-1 15.6-Inch Touch-Screen Laptop - Intel CoreTM i5-4200U processor/8GB Memory/1TB Hard Drive/Windows 8.1/ Silver
product_meta.description: This Acer Aspire R7-572-6423 laptop's 15.6" 10-finger multitouch screen simplifies navigation and features CineCrystal and IPS technologies for image clarity. An Ezel hinge enables 1-handed conversion between notebook, Ezel, tablet and display modes.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.7 out of 5 stars50 ratings3.7 out of 5 stars
